name: Solitaire Beautiful Garden Season
description:
Garden season, whenever you want!
"Solitaire Beautiful Garden Season offers hours of challenging gameplay.

Relax with a variety of solitaire variations, beautiful backgrounds and garden season card sets. Several locations with many levels are at your disposal.
The program is suitable for beginners as well as for the frequent solitaire player and offers challenging gameplay fun.

Features:

- Challenging solitaire game, suitable for the garden season
- Hand drawn card sets and matching cover sheets and beautiful backgrounds
- Various locations and trophies
- Hours of challenging entertainment
- Easy to understand help and handling
